name: BindGost
description:
BindGost

Game made in 2 days for GMTK GameJam

.

Bind is a explorer, with his dog, he's exploring a temple full of trap... and saws.
Dogde all the saws and get the highest score!
.
Control:

  • Bind: use W/S or Arrow to move Bind up and down
  • Gost: use Mouse to move around

(the further the dog, the better the light)
.

Music: Kevin MacLeod

- - -
